meanings.definition: The quality or state of being hip or fashionable.
meanings.sent1: Her outfit exuded hipness with its trendy colors and modern design.
meanings.sent2: The hipness of his haircut caught everyone's attention at the party.
meanings.sent3: She tried to impress her friends with her exaggerated hipness, but it just looked silly.
meanings.sent4: The hipness of the new restaurant in town made it the talk of the town.
meanings.sent5: The hipness of the celebrity's fashion choices set a new trend in the industry.

meanings.definition: The state of being aware of or knowledgeable about the latest trends or developments.
meanings.sent1: His hipness in technology allowed him to always have the latest gadgets.
meanings.sent2: She prided herself on her hipness in pop culture, always knowing the newest songs.
meanings.sent3: His exaggerated claims of hipness in fashion made his friends laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her hipness in social media was unmatched, always knowing the latest viral trends.
meanings.sent5: The hipness of his knowledge in current events impressed everyone at the party.

meanings.definition: The quality of being stylish or cool.
meanings.sent1: The hipness of his sunglasses added a touch of style to his outfit.
meanings.sent2: She exuded hipness with her cool demeanor and fashionable attire.
meanings.sent3: His attempt to show off his hipness in music only resulted in awkward dance moves.
meanings.sent4: The hipness of the vintage car made it a popular choice among collectors.
meanings.sent5: Her natural hipness in fashion made her a trendsetter among her friends.
